Class MinecraftGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraft.client.gui.DrawableHelper

          • com.lukflug.panelstudio.mc16forge.MinecraftGUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.minecraft.client.gui.Drawable, net.minecraft.client.gui.Element, net.minecraft.client.gui.ParentElement, net.minecraft.client.gui.screen.TickableElement
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MinecraftHUDGUI

    public abstract class MinecraftGUI
extends net.minecraft.client.gui.screen.Screen
    Implementation of Minecraft's Screen that renders a PanelStudio GUI.
